## DropdownProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DropdownProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoPositionX](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.autopositionx.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to horizontally auto position the dropdown open direction based on remaining space in the Y direction. |
|  [autoPositionXSpace](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.autopositionxspace.md) | <code>number</code> | The X-axis spacing to give the dropdown menu. |
|  [autoPositionY](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.autopositiony.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to auto position the dropdown open direction based on remaining space in the Y direction. |
|  [autoPositionYSpace](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.autopositionyspace.md) | <code>number</code> | The spacing to give the dropdown menu. |
|  [disabled](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.disabled.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether the dropdown is useable. |
|  [dropdownPosition](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.dropdownposition.md) | <code>DropdownPosition</code> | Sets whether the position that the drop down will render in. |
|  [IconComponent](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.iconcomponent.md) | <code>ComponentType&lt;IconProps&gt;</code> | The Icon to render within the dropdown |
|  [iconProps](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.iconprops.md) | <code>IconProps</code> | The props for the icon component. |
|  [initialIsOpen](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.initialisopen.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether the dropdown should be open by default. |
|  [initialItem](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.initialitem.md) | <code>DropdownItem</code> | The value when the dropdown is first rendered. Defaults to the first item in the list. |
|  [items](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.items.md) | <code>DropdownItem[]</code> | The list of items available for this dropdown. |
|  [label](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.label.md) | <code>string</code> | The string to render when no item is selected. |
|  [minWidth](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.minwidth.md) | <code>MinWidthProperty&lt;number &#124; string&gt;</code> |  |
|  [multiple](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.multiple.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Set to true to support multiple item selection. |
|  [onSelect](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.onselect.md) | <code>MultishiftChangeHandlerProps&lt;DropdownItem&gt;['onSelectedItemsChange']</code> | Called when a new item is selected. |
|  [selectedItems](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.selecteditems.md) | <code>DropdownItem[]</code> | An array of the selected items. |
|  [showLabel](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.showlabel.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether a label component should be displayed. Uses the label provided as the value. |
|  [showSelectedAsLabel](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.showselectedaslabel.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether to show the selected item label within the button. |
|  [width](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.width.md) | <code>WidthProperty&lt;number &#124; string&gt;</code> |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [renderLabel(params)](./ui-dropdown.dropdownprops.renderlabel.md) | A render prop for the label. Allows setting a custom label. |
